name: Magna-Cryl™ 2464
description: Magna-Cryl™ 2464 is a UV curable, permanent coating providing painted and bare metal aircraft parts with a protective coating against exposure to jet fuels and other aircraft fluids. It meets Boeing’s BMS 1060-A specification to protect aircraft parts from exposure to standard aircraft fluids. It can be applied by spray or brush. To cure Magna-Cryl 2464, a UV curable lamp is required.
